title: CONNECTION ERROR, "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to PVP.net server"
body:
I'm home on break, and since leaving school I haven't been able to get on to league. Every time I try to log in, there's a long delay, followed by the error message for not being able to connect to PVP.net (NA servers).  I've checked out and run through all the suggestions at "https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944" but it still hasn't resolved itself.  The problem is occurring both on wireless (wifi running at around 50mbps) and wired (ethernet at around 1 Gbps) connections.

Any help is very much appreciated.

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1424297844498/gg.png

replies.body:
There are likely local network settings that are preventing your client from reaching the PvP.net servers. Check out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that should resolve this.

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue.
I've now gone through these steps as well, to the best of my abilities, and nothing has changed, I'm still getting the same error message when I try to log in.

We'll need to have a tech take a look at your system logs to further troubleshoot this. I suggest running a set of logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). A member from our tech team will be able to assist you further.

Let me know if you have issues running those logs and submitting the ticket.
